name: VR Motorcycle Simulator for Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Motorcycle Simulator for Google Cardboard
description:
This is a VR motorcycle racing virtual reality game for Google Cardboard and other 3D mobile virtual reality headsets.
Use your VR headset to race a dirt bike off road, perform stunts, and explore a desert.

Get ready to drive a dual sport dirt bike in 3D virtual reality. Experience the real sensation of driving a dirt bike through the desert on your mobile virtual reality headset. This game boasts a 360 VR FPS field of view, addicting and endless gameplay. Press the Cardboard Trigger or any button on your gamepad to start the game, and drive across an open map desert world. Try to jump on sand dunes, and become a virtual reality motorcycle racer!


Features:
-Stereoscopic VR rendering and head tracking for mobile virtual reality
-Huge desert map to explore
-Off road dirt bike in which you are behind the wheel
-Immersive virtual reality experience
-Compatible with Google Cardboard and other VR headsets

Learn more about Google Cardboard here:
https://www.google.com/get/cardboard/

Works with any mobile stereoscopic headset with a built in accelerometer.

Some Compatible VR ( Virtual Reality ) Headsets Include:
Google Cardboard
Merge VR
Stooksy
Durovis Dive
Refugio 3D
VRTX One
ANTVR
VR Smartview
ColorCross
VRTRIA
Nibiru
